title: iJustine Hates Me - ASUS Vivobook 16x
description: ASUS Antibacterial Guard, a special coating applied to the most frequently touched parts of our laptop surface including the keyboard, the touchpad, the palm rest area and fingerprint sensor, has been clinically tested to inhibit the growth of bacteria by over 99% over a 24-hour period. Learn more about ASUS Antibacterial products here:  ASUS Vivobook 16x OLED:  ASUS ZenScreen MB16ACV -   Tech We REALLY Wish Came Back:  Microsoft Has LOST Their Minds:  TikTok Made Me Buy It:  I Built A Laptop, Again:  Apple Kills the Lightning Port:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Hello and Welcome 0:10 iJustine is Here! 0:26 Asus Vivobook 16X 1:58 Austin Licks the Laptop 2:40 Laptop Games (Copyright Free) 3:33 Game 1: Typing Race 4:24 Round 1 5:04 Round 2 5:28 Round 3 6:24 Game 2: Microsoft Paint 7:25 Drawing Begins 8:20 Beautiful Matt Art 9:22 Game 3: Fortnite 9:55 Asus ZenScreen 10:31 Where We Droppin Boys? 12:03 A Dub for Austin?!
